Quincy.Old South Union Church: The Old South Union Church is a congregational church at 25 Columbian Street in Weymouth, Massachusetts. The white clapboarded church is a replica of an 1853–54 building that was destroyed by fire in 1989. The building has a strong Greek Revival, with paneled pilasters on the front facade, but also has Italianate bracketed eaves and dentillated cornice and pediment.
